pr_title: Adds tighter checking of request bodies and cleans up a number of comments and todo items

timeline.message:
Add tighter checking of fields in request bodies

Signed-off-by: Graham Wallis <graham_wallis@uk.ibm.com>

Clean up of todos and comments

Signed-off-by: Graham Wallis <graham_wallis@uk.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: I assume we use toString for debugging , in that case wouldn't we want all the content like gen and depth etc. As an observation, normally there would be an equals and hashCode associated with a java bean.
timeline.author: davidradl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -68,7 +69,6 @@ public String toString()
                 ", platformName=" + platformName +
                 ", relationshipGUID=" + relationshipGUID +
                 ", enterpriseOption=" + enterpriseOption +
-                ", gen=" + gen +
